This class is the base class that is used by the client and the server to implement their ChunkSpace. More...

Detailed Description

This class is the base class that is used by the client and the server to implement their ChunkSpace.

This method adds an (unloaded) chunk to our collection.

This method clears out the chunk space of all its chunks and any other data that it may have accumulated.

Reimplemented in ChunkSpace, and ClientChunkSpace.

void BaseChunkSpace::clearSpaceData (  ) 

This method clears out the space data associated with this space.

const DataEntryMap& BaseChunkSpace::dataEntries (  )  [inline]

uint16 BaseChunkSpace::dataEntry ( const SpaceEntryID &  entryID,
uint16  key,
const std::string &  data 
)

Modify the given data entry in this chunk space.

If the instruction is to revoke a previous entry, then return the key that it used to have (or -1 if not found) If the instruction is to add a new entry, then return the key passed in, unless that entry id already exists, in which case return -1. The short version: -1 = bad :)

BaseChunkSpace::DataEntryMap::const_iterator BaseChunkSpace::dataRetrieve ( uint16  key  ) 

Retrieve the first data entry of the given key in this chunk space, in the form of an iterator which can be used to find them all.

const std::string * BaseChunkSpace::dataRetrieveFirst ( uint16  key  ) 

Retrieve the first data entry for that key in this chunk space.

BaseChunkSpace::DataValueReturn BaseChunkSpace::dataRetrieveSpecific ( const SpaceEntryID &  entryID,
uint16  key = uint16(-1) 
)

Retrieve the given exact entry.

key may be -1 and is just a hint. Return NULL if not found.

void BaseChunkSpace::delChunk ( Chunk *  pChunk  ) 

Remove an unloaded chunk.

Use only when it is no longer being referenced.

Run in main thread.

Chunk * BaseChunkSpace::findChunk ( const std::string &  identifier,
const std::string &  mappingName 
)

This method looks up a chunk in our map by its identifier.

Only run in main thread.

Chunk * BaseChunkSpace::findOrAddChunk ( Chunk *  pChunk  ) 

This method finds the chunk with the same identifier as the input chunk.

If it can't be found, it adds the chunk to our collection, otherwise, it deletes the input chunk and returns the found one.

Run in main thread.

void BaseChunkSpace::fini (  )  [protected]

This method must clears the current chunks from the space.
